title: CTA Opportunity Schema
description: A schema to add opportunity listings for member organizations and projects of the Collaborative Technology Alliance to the Murmurations Index

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the group or person creating this opportunity

exchange_type.title: Opportunity Type
exchange_type.description: Are you offering (giving) or wanting (requesting) something?
enumNames: Offer - I am offering something to lend, lease, sell or donate
Want - I am requesting something to borrow, rent, buy or receive

title.title: Opportunity Title
title.description: A few words describing the good or service you are offering or wanting

description.title: Description
description.description: A longer description (1 to 3 sentences) of the good or service you are offering or wanting

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords relevant to the good or service you are offering or wanting, searchable in the Murmurations index

image.title: Image
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://), preferably a square or 4:3 ratio image

details_url.title: Opportunity Details URL
details_url.description: A webpage (starting with https:// or http://) with further details about the opportunity

contact_details.title: Contact Details
contact_details.description: The contact details for the person or organization offering or wanting the opportunity (fill in at least one)

email.title: Email Address
email.description: You or your group's contact email address

contact_form.title: Contact Form
contact_form.description: A webpage (starting with https:// or http://) with a contact form that can be used to reach you or your group/project

starts_at.title: Start Date/Time
starts_at.description: The starting date and time for the opportunity (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

ends_at.title: End Date/Time
ends_at.description: The ending date and time for the opportunity (as a Unix timestamp, e.g., 1651848477)

geographic_scope.title: Geographic Scope
geographic_scope.description: The geographic scope of the opportunity

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the opportunity

schema.name: cta_opportunity-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: The opportunity schema for members of the Collaborative Technology Alliance
